title: Three Brexit Options for Britain: Soft, Softer or Softest
subtitle: Series Launch
summary: Although some UK political actors, like Prime Minister Theresa May and Brexit Minister David Davis, still insist that most UK citizens want a hard Brexit — meaning pulling out of the single market to regain control over...

title: What Justin Trudeau Can Do about His America Problem
subtitle: Series Launch
summary: Pity Justin Trudeau. By all accounts, the Prime Minister enjoyed an excellent relationship with President Obama. And, given their alignment on global issues, Trudeau may have been looking forward to a warm and productive relationship with Hillary Clinton when, as was widely expected, she moved into the White House after the November election.
